Uses of Package
org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload

  • Packages that use org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload 
    Package Description
    org.pikater.web.vaadin  
    org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload  
  • Classes in org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload used by org.pikater.web.vaadin 
    Class and Description
    IFileUploadEvents
    Interface useful to implement if you wish to: allow the user to continue browsing even before all uploads finish, unbind handling of the uploaded file from Vaadin (allowing the user to log out or switch views before the actual handling finishes).
    MyMultiUpload 
  • Classes in org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload used by org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload 
    Class and Description
    IFileUploadEvents
    Interface useful to implement if you wish to: allow the user to continue browsing even before all uploads finish, unbind handling of the uploaded file from Vaadin (allowing the user to log out or switch views before the actual handling finishes).
    MyUploadReceiver
    As stated in the Javadoc of IMyUploadReceiver, this implementation strives to replace the original receiver implementation in Vaadin's 'MultiFileUpload' plugin to: Give us more control over the construction of the server-side file.
    MyUploadStatePanel 
    MyUploadStateWindow
